name: Morning my Huggable Koala
greetingText: Roses are #FF0000, violets are #0000FF — happy Valentine’s from an Engineer!
wishText: And as one of my first messages said "I don’t know how to describe it, but with you, I find myself at peace and calm. Whenever you hold my hand or hug my arm, all the noise turns off. Trust me when I say I hope things work out and stay in sync, and that we can share more experiences together, Ms. Jarre Ibáñez. Would you like to be my Valentine?"
